dc:title: Cimice.net - Weather data from ARPAE stations
dc:description:
Shape file with weather data collect from January to October (2020-2021-2022). 
The observations are sourced from ARPAE's grib file (https://dati.arpae.it/dataset/previsioni-meteorologiche-emilia-romagna-elaborazione-app). ARPAE, the Regional Agency for Prevention, Environment, and Energy of Emilia-Romagna, integrates the functions of ARPA and the Environmental Services of the Provinces. It manages environmental and energy matters, including water resources, pollution control, waste management, and environmental assessments.
dc:creator: BIG

columns.dc:description: Latitude of the center of the monitored cell for weather data collection in the Emilia-Romagna region.
Longitude of the center of the monitored cell for weather data collection in the Emilia-Romagna region.
